text.english: Teorema: Reversing a list doesn't change it's length, i.e. \[ \forall l \in L_A . \; \texttt{len}(\texttt{rev}(l)) = \texttt{len}(l) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: interazione belList app, i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A . \; \forall b \in A. \; \texttt{belList}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2),b) = \texttt{belList}(l_1,b) \vee \texttt{belList}(l_2,b) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem belList_app: forall l1 l2 : list , forall b : A , belList (app l1 l2) b = belList l1 b || belList l2 b.
